Pre-Game Insights: France were unconvincing in the group stage and only advanced as runners-up.
Belgium also finished second in their group with one win, one draw and one loss.
Only one of France or Belgium will be present in the quarter-finals of Euro 2024.
Experts favor France to win based on their quality and experience.
France have reached the final in three of their last four appearances at the World Cup and the European Championship.
France have scored two goals so far - one was a penalty and one was an own goal.
Belgium lost to Slovakia, beat Romania, and tied with Ukraine to finish second in their group.
Romelu Lukaku had three goals disallowed in the group stage.
France will stick with their tried-and-trusted 4-3-3 formation, with Antoine Griezmann and Marcus Thuram set to be restored to the XI.
Dodi Lukebakio is likely to replace Leandro Trossard on the right for Belgium.
